txt.en: 'The Great Barrow is not a place for weak hearts or frail limbs. Wicked wights and evil lords make merry in their terror. They've never caught Old Tom and never will they. He's the Master!\n\n'If you be a-going, Tom will take you!'
'The darkness is behind us in that dank and dreary tomb. We'll make our way back into the light and feel the sun on our faces once more!'
'Well, my merry fellow! Ready to go a-leaping over barrows? Skip along and we'll sing a song that will make the Dark Ones rattle.'
You learned from the woman Andraste that the Lord of the Nazg√ªl was travelling to a place called Othrongroth. If you could spy on the Witch-king at this place, you might learn more of his plans.
Tom Bombadil has agreed to show you the way to Othrongroth, a barrow in the Barrow-downs.
Return to Tom Bombadil and claim your reward.\n\nYou and your allies braved the dark depths of Othrongroth and emerged victorious.
